w :  adam .  i can see that you simply couldn ' t give up smoking .
m :  nonsense .  smoking is the easiest thing in the world to give up .  i ' ve done it a hundred times .

question: what can we learn from the conversation ?
choice: the man found it easy to give up smoking .
the woman believed that the man could give up smoking .
the man couldn ' t give up smoking .
answer: the man couldn ' t give up smoking .
